metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5197 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Multiple unspecified vulnerabilities in Condor 7.6.x before 7.6.10 and7.8.x before 7.8.4 have unknown impact and attack vectors related to "errorchecking of system calls."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

condor - 8.4.2~dfsg.1-1build1
htcondor - 8.4.2~dfsg.1-1build1
libclassad7 - 8.4.2~dfsg.1-1build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: condor package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.4.2~dfsg.1-1build1').
